inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientBitlockerInfoV2_CL 
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where OSDisk_ProtectionStatus == 0
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, CollectionTime, OSDisk_DriveLetter, OSDisk_EncryptionPercentage, OSDisk_VolumeStatus, OSDisk_ProtectionStatus, OSDisk_CapacityGB,  OSDisk_KeyProtector
| sort by Computer asc  
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"INCOMPLIANT BITLOCKER | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo6470D-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo6470D-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientBitlockerInfoV2_CL 
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where OSDisk_ProtectionStatus == 1
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, CollectionTime, OSDisk_DriveLetter, OSDisk_EncryptionPercentage, OSDisk_VolumeStatus, OSDisk_ProtectionStatus, OSDisk_CapacityGB,  OSDisk_KeyProtector
| sort by Computer asc 
| summarize total = count()","size":0,"title":"COMPLIANT BITLOCKER | CLIENTS | COUNT","noDataMessageStyle":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo6470D-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo6470D-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"green"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientBitlockerInfoV2_CL 
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer
| where OSDisk_ProtectionStatus == 0
| project Computer, UserLoggedOn, CollectionTime, OSDisk_DriveLetter, OSDisk_EncryptionPercentage, OSDisk_VolumeStatus, OSDisk_ProtectionStatus, OSDisk_CapacityGB,  OSDisk_KeyProtector
| sort by Computer asc  
| summarize total = count() by bin(CollectionTime, 1d)
| render timechart","size":0,"aggregation":3,"title":"INCOMPLIANT BITLOCKER | CLIENTS | TIME 1 MONTH","noDataMessageStyle":3,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo6470D-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo6470D-t"],"visualization":"timechart","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":true,"size":"auto"},"chartSettings":{"seriesLabelSettings":[{"seriesName":"total","color":"redBright"},{"seriesName":"$hresholdLine","color":"green"},{"color":"green"}],"customThresholdLine":"0","customThresholdLineStyle":2,"ySettings":{"numberFormatSettings":{"unit":17,"options":{"style":"decimal","useGrouping":false,"maximumFractionDigits":0},"missingSparkDataOption":"Average"}}}}
